title.rendered: How to Find the Best Student Housing in Los Angeles, CA

content.rendered:
When it comes to a city bursting with educational opportunities, the City of Angels is high on the list. LA is home to 63 colleges and constantly attracts students from all over the world. Unfortunately, with a population of about 4 million, the city is also notorious for a regular shortage of good and affordable student housing in Los Angeles.

No matter where you’re studying, you’re going to need a student apartment in Los Angeles. To help you in your search for the perfect student housing in Los Angeles, check out the best apps to use.

Roomi

Roomi is a one-stop-shop for the best and most affordable rooms for students in Los Angeles. It also offers roommate services that are second to none allowing you a host of preferences that come together to find your ideal roommate. You can also choose the location, housing type, number of roommates, and whatever else matters to you.

Pros of Roomi

  1. Simple and easy to use: Roomi has a free mobile app that is easy to navigate. It simplifies the roommate and housing search in Los Angeles by making it easy for people to post and list rooms. In a city where finding accommodation isn’t always straightforward, Roomi is your best option to find student housing in Los Angeles.
  2. Free room search: It is free to search for apartments on the Roomi app so you don’t have to worry about exhausting your funds digging for an apartment you like.
  3. Verified listings: Roomi pre-verifies all listed rooms to ensure you don’t fall victim to any scams. First, they verify that the person listing the apartment actually stays there. They also request interior photos of the apartment and a photo of the lister. Unlike many other websites, you can be sure that any advertised space really exists.
  4. Extensive roommate verification: Roomi conducts an ID verification for all registered users on its platform. It also has the option of a background check for a little extra fee. This way, you can be sure that your roommate is who they say they are, and that you can trust them.

Cons

  1. Service isn’t entirely free: While Roomi is free to use for apartment searches, additional services like background checks require you to be on a paid plan.

Nooklyn

Nooklyn helps users find cheap apartments for students in Los Angeles.

Pros

  1. Free to use: Both the room search and roommate finder option are free. The app however charges a $20 application fee when you find an apartment you love.
  2. User ID Verification: For security, Nooklyn verifies the ID of all registered users on its platform.

Cons

  1. Difficult to navigate: The app leaves you with a lot of work to find the most suitable roommates based on your preference.
  2. Minimal verification of contact info: Unlike Roomi that uses GlobaliD to verify user contact, Nooklyn requires you to sign up with just an email address. And that’s all the verification there is for Nooklyn users.

Students RoomStay

Students RoomStay helps you find the perfect host family and can help you find a place close to your school.

Pros

  1. Family support: The website is particularly useful for students who need support when away from the family for the first time.
  2. Extra services: They offer additional services such as meal packages and transportation plans, accommodation matching, and online health care to mention a few. The services you can access would depend on your plan.

Cons

  1. Homestay option is expensive: According to the website, the homestay option in Los Angeles costs as much as $18,690.
  2. Lack of flexibility: The homestay option restricts your movement and flexibility and may limit your ability to explore your new place and have the freedom you would if you stayed with roommates.

Erasmusu

Erasmusu advertises itself as an expert in student accommodation.

Pros

  1. 100% online: The entire process of renting a house can be completed 100% online. So you can complete the process from the comfort of your home.
  2. Easy to Use: It is also generally easy, quick, and safe as the website has experts to help you through the process.

Cons

  1. Limited spaces: Spaces are often limited.
  2. Unregulated rent: The rent may not be regulated i.e there are no price and eviction controls so your landlord can hike the rent or refuse to sign a new lease as they so wish.

Places4Students

Places4Students allows students to search for rental properties, student sublets, and to check out roommate profiles online.

Pros

  1. All services are free: Whether searching for a rental property, looking to sublet, or suitable roommate profiles, all student services are FREE!
  2. Live support service: Places4Students as a toll-free live support service or online help link to help students through their room search process.

Cons

  1. No user verification: The website doesn’t verify the identity of any users on the platform.
  2. Unverified listings: There is also no attempt to verify places listed as available for rent on the platform.

Related: Find Rooms For Rent in Central LA, Los Angeles

Want the Best? Choose Roomi

Student housing in Los Angeles may be difficult to get when you’re out on your own. With Roomi, the process is not only faster, easier, and smoother – but it guarantees you get the student apartment in Los Angeles that suits you down to the ground. And when you need to find an awesome roommate? It finds you a roommate that suits your preference, too!

Roomi is your one-stop option to list or find rooms, find roommates to settle into a new city easily. Download the app and sign up today!

DOWNLOAD THE APP NOW!
FIND ROOMMATES
